scripts.preinstall: npx concurrently "cd ./cxy-home && pnpm install" "cd ./cxy-home-competition && pnpm install" "cd ./cxy-home-activity && pnpm install" "cd ./cxy-home-login && pnpm install"
scripts.alldev: npx concurrently "cd ./cxy-home && pnpm dev" "cd ./cxy-home-activity && PORT=3001 pnpm dev" "cd ./cxy-home-competition && PORT=3002 pnpm dev" "cd ./cxy-home-login && PORT=3003 pnpm dev"
scripts.allbuild: npx concurrently "cd ./cxy-home && pnpm build" "cd ./cxy-home-activity && pnpm build" "cd ./cxy-home-competition && pnpm build" "cd ./cxy-home-login && pnpm build"
scripts.allstart: pnpm allbuild && npx concurrently "cd ./cxy-home && pnpm dev" "cd ./cxy-home-activity && PORT=3001 pnpm dev" "cd ./cxy-home-competition && PORT=3002 pnpm dev" "cd ./cxy-home-login && PORT=3003 pnpm dev"
